location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 146: Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Shariarjee Rustomjee, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, replies to Shariarjee Rustomjee’s letter dated 9 March 1854. In response to Rustomjee’s statement in the earlier letter that he has appointed a Yezed national as his agent, Kemball writes that in this case it would be highly desirable that the agent he appoints be a British subject.
